column4: hello... anyone out there able to help with a mounting a Windows share?
can't write to it for some reason
i can give you my fstab mount line, but i can't explain it to you. i'm no expert...
i'd recommend this page though: http://customize.org/gtk/themes/57358
that page, not the one before :P
I was following instructions on a few other pages.
yep, the ubuntu documentation is pretty straight forward and covers all your options
